title: Does playing ranked in preseason affect anything?
body: I want to play ranked (cos y not?) however i dont want to get demoted before end of season rewards. Is playing ranked in preseason affect your ranking or end of season rewards?

replies.body:
It doesn't affect end of season rewards, those were locked in when season ended (4am AEST today). 

It may affect your placements next season as you undergo a soft reset before obtaining your new rank after the 10 initial games, although preseason climb doesn't usually change that much unless you climb or drop significantly from where you ended last season.

I know this thread is quite old but what is significantly. I ended Preseason is P3 and now demoted to P5. Would that be consider significant? If not, what would be?

p.s ranked in preseason is a nightmare!

Since you are plat 5 and if got your season rewards when you were plat 3 it doesn't affect you until the ranks reset because when the ranks reset you are going to be placed in gold because you dropped into plat 5 in preseason
So if i am silver in s7 and hit gold in the preseason will I still get the skin and the border?
unfortunately, no rewards will be given if you got a better rank in the pre season/ off season.
